      • evalFile

        protected java.lang.Object evalFile(java.lang.String filePath)
        Evaluates a file of code and returns the value of the last expression with the exception of PHP which returns the wrapper object. You can do this instead of executing the file. Like the execFile the file should now be cached with the key being the filePath.
        Parameters:
        filePath - - dotCMS file path
        Returns:
        The last call of the
